regen.absent_element: Explicit mention of job ending condition
regen.new_specification: The libra shall update the execution host queue status explicitly when a job ends.

regen.absent_element: detailed context or prerequisite action when a job ends or is removed
regen.new_specification: The Libra shall ensure that all prerequisite actions specific to a job completing and being removed are conducted prior to updating the execution host queue status.

regen.absent_element: verifying resource availability before updating the execution host queue status
regen.new_specification: The libra shall verify resource availability on the node before updating the execution host queue status when a job is scheduled for execution.

label: After the execution host queue status is updated, the libra shall send the information about the additional load on the queue and node to the central information store.
absence: update status information of the cluster
